posts.post_content:
Posted By: Kevin Cummings
A bit on the light side, but still sharp and clear. Downgraded ridiculously for back damage that you really need to examine closely to see the extent. The picture actually makes it look worse than it is. $200 delivered or will trade for something on my want list.

N172 Old Judge Players – Charlie Bastian, Jack Farrell, Mike Griffin (arms folded or batting), Frank Hankinson, John Harkins, William Hoover, Michael Hughes, John Kelly, Harry Lyons, Jim McGarr (with umpire), Charlie Reipschlager, Taylor Shaffer, Leon Viau, James White, Ed Williamson & mascot
N172 Old Judge Teams - Jersey City, Lowell, Mansfield, Wilkes-Barre
